item.title: Wonder if you should switch from your RDBMS to Apache Hadoop: Don't!
item.description: Wonder if you should switch from your RDBMS to Apache Hadoop: Don’t! # Last weekend I spend a lot of fun time at FrOSCon* in Sankt Augustin - always great to catch up with friends in the open source space. As always there were quite a few talks on NoSQL, Hadoop, but also really solid advise on tuning your system for stuff like MySQL (including a side note on PostgreSQL and Oracle) from Kristian KÃ¶hntopp.
